document.full_text: pfizer inc  said it struck a deal to sell its capsugel unit, the world's largest maker of hard capsules, to private equity firm kkr & co  for nearly $2.38 billion.
document.title: pfizer selling capsugel to kkr for $2.38 billion
lines_and_colors: pfizer inc  said it struck a deal to sell its capsugel unit, the world's largest maker of hard capsules, to private equity firm kkr & co  for nearly $2.38 billion.
